channel.title: Paintshop help
channel.description:
OK, to start off my request/help.etc, i need help on Paintshop. and the picture i drew of that random guy is not from paintshop, but i uploaded it to my paintshop. anyways, i need help on paintshop. basically i'm a [u]SUCKY[/u] Paintshop person, i need help on being a pro on paintshop Because i can't draw a good person or anime person Correctly, I do use the lines and i focus very good but i screw up.
[b]If someone could be kind topost some links, or some advice to being a good pro on paintshop. thank you![/b] :cool:

item.title: Paintshop help
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Good pro?

If your a professional, your good already…

Read full topic

item.title: Paintshop help
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

You can’t just be told what to do to become pro, it takes ages to become pro.
Google ‘Paintshop Tutorials’ and you’ll figure out things a few steps at a time.

Read full topic
